description: This salad is vibrant and invigorating, packed with lentils and green veggies for the perfect filling lunch.
keywords: Green salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Avocado,Asparagus,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Super Green Lentil Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the lemon juice, zest, half of the chopped parsley and olive oil together in a small bowl to make a dressing.
Steam the broccoli and asparagus for 3 minutes until tender. Place in a large bowl with the lentils, spring onions, spinach and avocado, pour over the dressing and toss well.
Serve with the remaining fresh parsley and pumpkin seeds on top.
